process.title: How Casaora works for your home
process.description: Three simple steps connect you with trusted, background-checked professionals

step1.title: Tell us what you need
step1.description: Select your service—cleaning, childcare, cooking, or eldercare. Choose your schedule, location, and any special requirements.

step2.title: Meet verified professionals

step3.title: Book instantly & relax
step3.description: Confirm your booking with secure payment. Chat through the app, and enjoy peace of mind with our satisfaction guarantee.

howItWorksCards.subtitle: Book trusted home help in 3 simple steps

howItWorksCards.enjoyDescription: Every booking includes background checks, secure payments, and our satisfaction guarantee.

trustChecklist.title: Your safety is our priority
trustChecklist.subtitle: Every professional on Casaora is vetted, verified, and backed by our platform guarantees.

background.title: Background Checks
background.description: Every professional passes comprehensive criminal background screening through certified agencies before joining our platform.

identity.title: ID Verification
identity.description: Government-issued ID verification confirms each professional's identity with document scanning and biometric checks.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: All payments are processed through PCI-compliant processors. Your payment details are encrypted and never shared.

guarantee.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: Not happy with a service? Contact us within 24 hours and we'll make it right—or refund your booking.

trustChecklist.footer: These protections are included with every booking at no extra cost.

verification.title: 3-step verification process
verification.description: Our streamlined process ensures every professional meets our high standards through application review, identity verification, and comprehensive background screening.

background.title: Criminal background checks
background.description: Every professional undergoes comprehensive criminal background screening through certified agencies. We verify national and local records to ensure your family's safety.

identity.title: Identity verification
identity.description: Government ID verification confirms each professional's identity. We cross-reference documents and use biometric checks to prevent fraud.

references.title: Reference validation
references.description: We contact previous employers and personal references to verify work history, reliability, and character before approval.

guarantee.title: Your satisfaction, guaranteed
guarantee.subtitle: If something's not right, we'll make it right — or your money back.

quality.title: Quality assurance
quality.description: Every professional on our platform is held to the highest standards. We monitor ratings, reviews, and service quality to ensure consistent excellence.

reporting.title: Easy issue reporting
reporting.description: Something not right? Report issues directly in the app within 24 hours of your service. Our team reviews every case personally.

reservice.title: Free re-service
reservice.description: If the service doesn't meet expectations, we'll send a professional back at no additional cost to make it right.

refund.title: Money-back guarantee
refund.description: If we can't resolve the issue to your satisfaction, you'll receive a full refund. No questions asked, no hassle.

booking.question: How do I book a service?
booking.answer: Browse our professional directory, select a professional, choose your preferred date and time, and complete the booking. You'll receive a confirmation email once the booking is accepted.

payment.question: How do payments work?
payment.answer: Payment is authorized when you book but only captured after the service is completed. We accept all major credit cards. Your payment information is securely stored and encrypted.

cancellation.question: What is the cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel your booking up to 24 hours before the scheduled start time for a full refund. Cancellations made less than 24 hours in advance may be subject to a cancellation fee.

professional.question: How are professionals vetted?
professional.answer: All professionals undergo a comprehensive verification process including identity verification, background checks, and reference validation. We also monitor ratings and reviews to ensure quality.

emergency.title: Emergency Contact
emergency.description: For urgent matters or safety concerns during an active service, please call our emergency line immediately.

postService.description: You receive a digital receipt immediately. The professional receives their payout (minus platform fees) within 2-3 business days.

chargedAfter.title: Only charged after service completion

cancellation.title: Cancellation protections

dispute.description: If service wasn't delivered as promised, contact support within 24 hours. We review disputes and process refunds when appropriate.

professionals.description: Join our network and connect with families looking for reliable help.

verification.question: How does Casaora verify professionals?
verification.answer: All professionals undergo a comprehensive screening process including background checks, reference verification, and skills assessment. We verify identity documents, work history, and conduct in-person interviews to ensure quality and safety.

payments.question: How do payments work?
payments.answer: When you book a service, we authorize a hold on your payment method. Funds are only captured after the service is completed. Professionals receive payment within 2-3 business days after service completion. All payments are processed securely through PCI DSS Level 1 certified processors.

cancellation.question: What happens if I need to cancel?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel any booking before the scheduled start time through your dashboard. Cancellations made 24+ hours in advance receive a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a cancellation fee to compensate the professional for their reserved time.

recurring.question: Can I book recurring services?
recurring.answer: Yes! During the booking process, you can set up recurring appointments on a weekly, biweekly, or monthly basis. This ensures you have consistent help and builds a long-term relationship with your preferred professional.

areas.question: What areas do you serve?
areas.answer: We operate in four countries: Colombia (Bogotá, Medellín, Cali, Barranquilla, Cartagena, Bucaramanga, Pereira), Paraguay (Asunción, Ciudad del Este, Encarnación), Uruguay (Montevideo, Punta del Este, Maldonado), and Argentina (Buenos Aires, Córdoba, Rosario, Mendoza). We're actively expanding to new cities based on demand.

becomePro.question: How do I become a professional on Casaora?
becomePro.answer: Click 'Apply to join' and complete our application form. We'll review your information, conduct a background check, and schedule an interview. Once approved, you'll complete onboarding and can start accepting bookings. The entire process typically takes 5-7 business days.

faq.title: Common questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing

q1.question: Why is there a service fee?
q1.answer: The 15% service fee covers background checks, professional vetting, insurance coverage, payment processing, and 24/7 customer support. This ensures every professional on our platform is verified and you have protection if anything goes wrong.

q2.question: Do professionals pay any fees?
q2.answer: No. Professionals keep 100% of their rate. The service fee is added on top and paid entirely by the customer. This allows professionals to set fair rates without losing a portion to platform fees.

q3.question: How does booking work?
q3.answer: Browse verified professionals, check their availability, and book instantly. You'll see the full price upfront—professional's rate plus 15% service fee. Pay securely online and communicate directly with your pro.

q4.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q4.answer: No hidden fees. You see the professional's rate plus the 15% service fee upfront before booking. That's the total cost—no surprises, no add-ons.

meta.title: About Us - Our Story | Casaora
meta.description: Learn about Casaora's mission to connect families in Latin America with trusted, verified home professionals through our marketplace built for trust and safety.

story.title: Trust and Safety, Simplified
story.subtitle: We're building the trusted marketplace that connects families with verified home professionals across Latin America.

problem.title: The Challenge We're Solving
problem.paragraph1: Finding reliable domestic help shouldn't be stressful. Families in Latin America face uncertainty about trust and safety, informal arrangements without clear expectations, and a lack of verified professionals.
problem.paragraph2: Traditional word-of-mouth recommendations are limited, and existing platforms don't offer the verification, transparency, or ongoing support that families and professionals truly need.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.paragraph1: Casaora is a marketplace built for trust and safety. We combine technology with human support to create a seamless, trustworthy experience:

feature1.title: Verified Professionals
feature1.description: Every professional goes through background checks, ID verification, and skills assessment before joining our platform.

feature2.title: Bilingual Support
feature2.description: Our entire platform and support team operates in both English and Spanish, eliminating communication barriers.

feature3.title: Ongoing Assistance
feature3.description: From booking to completion, our team is available to help resolve any issues and ensure quality service.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.paragraph1: Founded by people who experienced these challenges firsthand, Casaora was born from a simple idea: finding trustworthy domestic help should be easy, safe, and stress-free. Today, we're proud to serve families and empower home professionals across Latin America.

missionVision.sectionSubtitle: We're on a mission to make domestic services accessible, transparent, and trustworthy for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To dignify domestic work and make it simple, safe, and fair for families in Latin America to work with verified home professionals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A Latin America where every home professional has access to decent work, and every household can rely on trusted support at home.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do

trust.title: Trust First
trust.description: We verify every professional and maintain transparent communication to earn and keep your trust.

quality.title: Quality Service
quality.description: We set high standards for professionals and continuously monitor service quality through reviews and feedback.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Excellence
bilingual.description: We eliminate language barriers by supporting both English and Spanish across our entire platform.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We empower families to find reliable help and professionals to build sustainable careers.

team.title: Our Remote-First Team
team.subtitle: We're a distributed team spanning Latin America and the United States, united by our mission to serve families and professionals.

remoteFirst.title: Built for Global Impact
remoteFirst.description: As a remote-first company, we practice what we preach. Our distributed team brings diverse perspectives and deep local knowledge. We work asynchronously across time zones to provide responsive support for our community.

distributed.title: Globally Distributed
distributed.description: Our team spans Latin America and the US, giving us deep insight into both family and professional needs.

bilingual.title: Fully Bilingual
bilingual.description: Every team member speaks both English and Spanish fluently, ensuring seamless communication.

available.title: Always Available
available.description: With team members across time zones, we provide responsive support when you need it.

expertise.title: Diverse Expertise
expertise.description: Our backgrounds in hospitality, tech, and operations bring well-rounded solutions to complex challenges.

joinTeam.title: Want to Join Our Mission?
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for passionate people who want to make a difference in the lives of families and professionals.

support.description: Our bilingual team is available to help resolve any issues before, during, and after your service.

safety.title: Safety & Trust
safety.subtitle: Your security is our top priority. Here's how we keep you protected.

verification.title: Rigorous Verification
verification.description: Every professional undergoes background checks, ID verification, and skills assessment before joining our platform. We continuously monitor quality through reviews.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: All payments are processed through certified processors with bank-level encryption. Customers are protected, and professionals get paid reliably after each job.

support.title: 24/7 Dedicated Support
support.description: Our bilingual support team is available around the clock to help resolve any issues, answer questions, and ensure smooth service delivery.

q1.question: How are professionals verified?
q1.answer: Every professional goes through a comprehensive verification process including background checks, ID verification, reference checks, and skills assessment. We also continuously monitor service quality through customer reviews and ratings.

q2.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
q2.answer: Your satisfaction is guaranteed. If you're not happy with a service, contact our support team within 24 hours and we'll work to resolve the issue—whether that's arranging a redo, finding a different professional, or issuing a refund.

q3.question: How do payments work?
q3.answer: For customers: Pay securely through the platform using credit/debit cards or bank transfers. Your payment is held securely until the service is completed. For professionals: You receive payment automatically after each completed job, minus our small service fee.

q4.question: Can I communicate in English?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Our entire platform, support team, and many of our professionals are fully bilingual. You can browse, book, and get support entirely in English or Spanish—whatever you're most comfortable with.

workerRights.title: Your Rights as a Household Professional

contracts.title: Written Employment Contracts
contracts.description: You have the right to a clear, written contract outlining your duties, hours, compensation, and terms before starting any permanent position.

minimumWage.title: Fair Compensation
minimumWage.description: All positions must meet or exceed local minimum wage requirements. Your rate is transparent and agreed upon before work begins.

workingHours.title: Reasonable Working Hours
workingHours.description: Standard working hours, overtime compensation, and rest periods as required by local labor laws.

benefits.title: Social Security & Benefits
benefits.description: For full-time placements, employers must comply with local requirements for health insurance, social security, and other mandated benefits.

antiHarassment.title: Zero Tolerance for Harassment
antiHarassment.description: Casaora maintains a strict zero tolerance policy for any form of harassment, discrimination, or unsafe working conditions.

zeroTolerance.title: We do not tolerate:
zeroTolerance.verbal: Verbal abuse, threats, or derogatory language
zeroTolerance.physical: Physical intimidation, unwanted contact, or violence
zeroTolerance.discrimination: Discrimination based on race, gender, nationality, or any protected characteristic
zeroTolerance.workEnvironment: Unsafe working conditions or unreasonable demands

reporting.title: How to Report Issues
reporting.description: If you experience harassment, safety concerns, or contract violations, you have multiple confidential reporting channels:

casaoraSupport.title: Casaora Support Team
casaoraSupport.description: Email us anytime for confidential assistance. We respond within 24 hours for safety concerns.

emergencyHotline.title: Emergency Hotline
emergencyHotline.description: For urgent safety concerns, call our 24/7 emergency line:

localAuthorities.title: Local Labor Authorities
localAuthorities.description: You always have the right to contact local labor ministry offices or emergency services directly.

confidentiality.title: Your Privacy is Protected
confidentiality.description: All reports are handled confidentially. We never share your identity without your explicit permission, except when required by law.

legalContracts.title: Legal Contracts & Documentation
legalContracts.description: Every full-time placement through Casaora includes proper legal documentation to protect your rights:

written.title: Written Employment Agreement
written.description: Clear terms covering responsibilities, hours, compensation, vacation, notice periods, and termination conditions.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.description: Exact hourly rate or salary, payment frequency, overtime rules, and any additional benefits specified in writing.

termination.title: Termination Protection
termination.description: Notice period requirements for both parties, severance terms if applicable, and your rights during dismissal.

faqCta.title: Frequently asked questions
faqCta.subtitle: Everything you need to know about joining Casaora

faqs.question: How much can I earn on Casaora?
faqs.answer: You set your rate and hours. We don't charge pros; customers pay a 15% fee on top.

faqs.question: How do I get paid?
faqs.answer: Secure payments after each job; we transfer to your bank.

faqs.question: Do I need to speak English?
faqs.answer: Not required. We offer bilingual support to help with English-speaking clients.

faqs.question: What if a family cancels a booking?
faqs.answer: Cancellation policy protects you; late cancellations pay per our rules in the app.

faqs.question: Is there a contract or commitment?
faqs.answer: No long-term contract; you control your schedule.

faqs.question: What services can I offer?
faqs.answer: Housekeeping, childcare, eldercare, cooking, laundry, pets, and more.
